post.body: thanks. Dad has an obsession with fast cards but I've never run into problems. A good idea to have a backup card though
I just realised the 450D uses SD cards - have you got any? Or is that on the shopping list for Dad?
indeed! And it was in my sis-in-laws manual civic too, so uphill was a challenge.
Congrats!! You worry about study because you are Asian and it's in our blood.
jealous much!

sweet find! Added and following.

you have to go to the website, register and then mouse over the presents under the tree to get your free software
Back from Leura. Time to deal with the boring stuff, bills etc.
Leura-Jenolan Caves = 0 petrol stations. Fuel light on way down. 30km blast uphill to Oberon with Toyota 4WD on tail. Made it with 3L left.
Happy New Year. Here we go 2009!
Current twitter location. Morning bushwalk and then picnic lunch. http://twitpic.com/xscl
Sitting at cafe in Leura and who should walk by but some old friends from uni/church!
Gear for the week. Camera, laptop, bohnanza and Catan
Leura. A balmy 32 deg celcius. Home for the next 6 days
At the cinemas. Going to watch a movie here for the first time in... 12 months?
Wondering what to get with my Apple Store gift card
